explains: adv. 欣然地；愿意地，乐意地

sentences.en: People would willingly pay more for better services.
sentences.cn: 有好一些的服务，人们是愿意多花钱的。

sentences.en: When her mother suggested that she stay, Alice willingly acquiesced.
sentences.cn: 当她的母亲建议她留下时，艾丽丝欣然默许。

sentences.en: "Willingly," said the tailor, '"that is child's play!"
sentences.cn: “我很乐意，”裁缝说，“那是小菜一碟！”
